tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
title_narrative: Humanitarian mine action in Syria: reducing explosive risks faced by civilians and humanitarian actors through survey and clearance
Azione umanitaria contro le mine: ridurre i rischi da esplosivi affrontati da civili e operatori umanitari in Siria attraverso lo sminamento
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: The programme falls into UNMAS Syria Response Plan (SRP), which aims at minimizing the impact of Explosive Ordnance (EO) on communities most at risk
Il presente programma si inserisce all’interno del Programma di risposta di UNMAS in Siria, che ha l’obiettivo di ridurre l’impatto degli ordigni esplosivi sulle comunità maggiormente a rischio.
